name: Commander: Modern War
description:
Intro


Commander: Modern War is a tactical turn-based game, opposing two factions in a modern conflict. Fight for the Alliance to protect the values of freedom, or choose the Coalition to repress those who oppose you. Infantry, vehicles, and air units are at your command.

Description


The conflict could not hold any longer, play the campaign for each faction, battle on skirmish maps, choose different parameters on the maps, and battle up to 7 other commanders.

  • Battle with two different factions for complete dominance of the battlefield
  • Recruit infantry, vehicles, and air units to help in your mission
  • Capture different locations ensuring a steady income to recruit new units
  • Use the terrain as cover to increase the odds of a favorable battle outcome
  • Use specialized units to counter specific units
  • Create and edit maps in the Map Editor
